Comment: On June 11, 2024, Dmitry Peskov, Press Secretary to Vladimir Putin, officially declared the United States an “enemy country” to Russia.   > "We are now an enemy country for them, just as they are for us," Peskov told reporters when commenting on claims made by former American intelligence officer Scott Ritter that he was barred from traveling to Russia and had his passport confiscated by border officials.](https://www.newsweek.com/kremlin-peskov-united-states-enemy-scott-ritter-1908616)    So how are Trumps actions with Russian not defined as treason—specifically as stated  in the constitution of "adhering to their Enemies, giving them Aid and Comfort"?
